pr_title: DHFPROD-4679: Adding hub-central-developer and hub-central-operator r…

timeline.bodyText: I think we should just delete this user and hub-operator, since we have pari and melissa.
timeline.author: rjrudin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,12 +3,6 @@
   "description": "Generic developer account; will soon be superceded by persona-specific accounts",
   "password": "%%testPassword%%",
   "role": [
-    "data-hub-developer",
-    "hub-central-user",
-    "hub-central-entity-model-writer",
-    "hub-central-load-writer",
-    "hub-central-mapping-writer",
-    "hub-central-flow-writer",
-    "hub-central-downloader"
+    "hub-central-developer"

timeline.bodyText:
seems to be missing:
hub-central-entity-model-writer and
hub-central-clear-user-data(should be allowed, since downloader is added?)
timeline.author: bsrikan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+{
+  "role-name": "hub-central-developer",
+  "description": "Permits developing and operating a Data Hub application via Hub Central",
+  "role": [

replies.bodyText: Yes. I was missing the clear-user-data and explorer related roles from the list in the wiki. It should be resolved now.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.author: bsrikan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+{
+  "role-name": "hub-central-operator",
+  "description": "Permits operating a Data Hub application via Hub Central",
+  "role": [
+    "hub-central-user",

timeline.bodyText: Pari should have data-hub-developer right and data-hub-developer should inherit hub-central-developer?
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: No. hub-central-developer grants access to the Hub Central UI. Having having access to Hub Central shouldn't be granted via the data-hub-developer role.
replies.author: ryanjdew

replies.bodyText: ok makes sense. Although, I would still expect Pari a MarkLogic expert to have data-hub-developer role.
replies.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText:
I missed this - pari should still have data-hub-developer, in addition to hub-central-developer, as she'll be doing things like running hubDeploy.
Perhaps HCD should inherit DHD by default? Is there really a use case for someone to be an HCD but not a DHD?
replies.author: rjrudin
